content: --इंद्रः {1} ‘the great Indra,’ <ab>N.</ab> of Indra; <ls>Ku. 5. 53</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 20</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 7.</ls> {2} a chief or leader in general. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain range; पतिमर्हद्रेंस्य महोदधेश्च <ls>R. 6. 54</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 39</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">43.</ls>

महेंद्र One of the seven principal chains of mountains in India identified with Mahendra Māle which divides Gañjam from the valley of the Mahānadī and probably included the whole of the eastern Ghats between the Mahānadī and Godāvarī.
